      public void setActivePosition(Position newActivePosition, ArrayList<ArrayList<Position>> positions)
      Sets the current active position of the player. The current active position is highlighted on the chessboard.
      Parameters:
      newActivePosition -
      positions - the current positions of the chessboard.

    • canIescape

      public boolean canIescape(ArrayList<ArrayList<Position>> positions, Position newActivePosition)
      returns true or false if the player can make a move to escape checkmate. this can be taking the piece that produces the check or blocking the check.
      Parameters:
      positions -
      newActivePosition -
      Returns:
